snippet: Though a final benefits package has not been decided, it was unlikely to include the medical, dental and housing allowances desired by gay and lesbian couples.
abstract: Defense Sec Leon E Panetta is preparing to expand benefits to same-sex partners of military personnel, but it remains doubtful whether the Pentagon will offer the medical, dental and housing allowances desired by gay and lesbian couples.
lead_paragraph: Though a final benefits package has not been decided, it was unlikely to include the medical, dental and housing allowances desired by gay and lesbian couples.

headline.seo: Pentagon to Extend Certain Benefits to Same-Sex Partners
headline.main: Pentagon to Extend Certain Benefits to Same-Sex Partners
headline.print_headline: Military Extending Some Benefits to Gay Partners

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
